sentences.text: Jonathan W. Ayers President, Chief Executive Officer and  Chairman of the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 23, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Stockholders,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We completed an exceptional year at IDEXX in 2016 and enter 2017 with tremendous momentum, continuing to drive the lywheel of enduring growth that characterizes the IDEXX business model.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In early 2017 we also received significant recognition of our success as a publicly traded company: IDEXX was added to both the S&P 500, the premier benchmark for large-cap U.S. equities, as well as the NASDAQ-100 Index, which includes the 100 largest non-financial NASDAQ-listed companies based on market capitalization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we remained true to our core values and continued to extend our track record of strong organic growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 revenues grew 11% as compared to the prior year, while we also expanded our operating margins and increased cash flow generation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we reached significant landmarks in our U.S. companion animal group (CAG) revenues and global Water business revenues in 2016: they surpassed $1 billion and $100 million, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We attribute our extraordinary 2016 success primarily to our continued focus on creating exceptional value for our stockholders through disciplined execution of our long-term strategy:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focusing on our existing, highly attractive markets  including the veterinary diagnostic, software and data segment of the pet healthcare market  which we believe will continue to grow faster than the general economy over the long term due to global, macro trends  including the increasingly close emotional bonds pet owners share with their four-legged family members;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generating market growth and fostering customer loyalty through advancements in medical standards in pet healthcare, through a direct presence with veterinarians in the major global economies, with continuous, measured expansion of our industry leading sales, marketing and customer support capability over time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Increasing growth of the durable and profitable recurring revenue streams, which comprise approximately 87% of our total revenues; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expanding our margins gradually and consistently -- while supporting-high return investments toward our long-term business potential -- and expanding cash flow generation, supporting a disciplined capital allocation strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our consistent strategic focus and strong execution, through a growing group of over 7,000 highly committed and talented DEXX employees, has delivered exceptional returns for our stockholders over time, reflected in the 22% compound average annual growth of our stock over the past 15 years, an accomplishment matched by few other members of the S&P 500.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Enhancing the Health and Well-Being of Pets through Innovative Diagnostic and Software Technologies, Data and Global Leadership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that our innovative diagnostic and software technology products and services and the data they generate enhance he health and well-being of pets and the people who love them by raising the standard of veterinary care.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our software solutions mprove the efficiency, management and performance of veterinary practice operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our position as a global eader in this market segment enables us to deliver integrated product and service offerings that span diagnostic modalities  everaging integrated data management and insight  which we believe further enhances the health and well-being of pets and is valuable to our veterinary customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through our industry-leading diagnostic innovations, such as the IDEXX Catalyst One Chemistry Analyzer, the IDEXX SDMA Test and the SediVue Dx Urine Sediment Analyzer, we are elevating the standard of care, including the early detection, diagnosis and management of diseases that affect dogs and cats.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through our software offerings, including Cornerstone
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Practice Management Software and VetConnect PLUS, and our cloud-based practice systems, including IDEXX Neo
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Software, IDEXX Animana and Petly Plans, we are helping veterinarians advance the management and marketing of their practices, supporting their practice growth and staff productivity, improving access to diagnostic and medical information and improving practice profitability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Raising the standard of care and supporting a veterinary practices medical and business processes drive the practices overall growth, and thus our growth, while also supporting the expansion of the veterinary diagnostic segment of the pet healthcare market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Growing our Global Leadership Position and Creating New Product Markets through Sustained Investment in Innovation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ntelligent, disciplined innovation, fostered by a culture that supports and rewards an entrepreneurial spirit, is fundamental to our success and supports the growth of our global leadership positions in the market segments we serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through our close connections to our veterinarian customers, our industry-leading investments in research and development (R&D) and our refined R&D and new product development capability gained through our cumulative experience over several decades, we are able to offer unique, proprietary solutions that enable veterinary care providers to practice advanced medical care, demonstrate the value of diagnostics to pet owners and better manage their veterinary practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our R&D investment represents more than 80% of the veterinary diagnostics industrys R&D investment:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focus on the Growing Pet Healthcare Market
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although we serve a number of attractive markets, global pet healthcare is our primary market, representing 86% of our total revenues in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The long-term growth of the pet healthcare market is driven by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The enduring bond between pets and their owners;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pet owners ever-increasing desire to spend on the health and well-being of pets, supported by the even stronger bonds that many millennials share with their four-legged family members;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our innovations that expand the veterinarians medical tool kit, increasing the available standard of care, and our field resources that support veterinarians adoption of these innovations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Educating pet owners on the value of diagnostic testing in the delivery of pet care, including preventive care;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Growing awareness of the importance of pet healthcare globally; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pet owners outside the U.S. experiencing and enjoying a rising standard of li
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VCA, Inc. does not report any R&D investment in its filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1) Source: Heska Corporations filings with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2) Source: Abaxis Inc.s filings with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our cumulative R&D investment of approximately $1 billion over the last 15 years, and the competencies in product development that we have built over time and with experience, have enabled IDEXX to introduce innovative CAG products that we expect will continue to grow our profitable recurring diagnostic revenues for many years, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IDEXX Catalyst One Chemistry Analyzer  IDEXX Catalyst One Chemistry Analyzer, our next generation chemistry analyzer, offers the capability of our Catalyst Dx platform to a broader audience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through this innovative product offering, we expanded the market for our Catalyst technology, which enables our veterinary customers to test and deliver real-time results to patients from a blood sample drawn during the patient visit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By the end of 2016, we had a worldwide installed base of over 24,500 Catalyst analyzers, and we believe that significant placement opportunities remain for our Catalyst platform globally.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IDEXX SDMA Test  The IDEXX SDMA Test advances veterinary care by enhancing the way that veterinarians diagnose and treat disease, including kidney disease.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kidney disease is to pets as heart disease is to humans: a major health concern.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In pets, kidney disease is often a secondary consequence of several other diseases, including urinary and other infections, thyroid, cardiac and certain cancers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SDMA is the most sensitive marker available today for identifying kidney disease.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With the ability to detect kidney disease much earlier and in more pets, veterinarians have more options to diagnose, treat and manage not only kidney disease but asignificant number of these related illnesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe the IDEXX SDMA Test  which is included in our reference laboratories routine chemistry panels  highly differentiates IDEXXs diagnostic offering.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we are working to make the IDEXX SDMA Test available to our customers in their practices by adding SDMA testing to our Catalyst platform, and we expect to launch this innovation at the end of 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SediVue Dx Urine Sediment Analyzer  The SediVue Dx Urine Sediment Analyzer brings automation, speed and consistency to urinalysis, a traditionally laborious and variable process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It uses proprietary image processing algorithms similar to facial recognition technology to identify clinically relevant particles found in urine and captures high-contrast digital images that become part of the permanent patient record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We successfully launched the SediVue Dx Urine Sediment Analyzer in North America, the UK and Australia in 2016, and this new product contributed approximately 2% to overall revenue growth in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that demand will continue to be strong as we complete our international launch in 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These innovations, along with our many other advancements in diagnostics and veterinary software applications  such as SNAP Pro for automating rapid assay testing, advanced fecal antigen and molecular diagnostics menu, advances in VetConnect PLUS for both test requisition and results analysis, and IDEXX Neo, IDEXX Animana, Web PACS and IDEXX Pet Health Network Pro and Petly Plans, our cloud-based practice software offerings  also highly differentiate our integrated diagnostics portfolio of products and services from those of our competitors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generating Market Growth and Fostering Customer Loyalty Through Our Industry-Leading Commercial Capability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are committed to developing and maintaining strong relationships with our veterinarian customers through continuous, direct contact, which we believe drives broader adoption of our products and services and maintains a high level of customer loyalty.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To foster strong, personal relationships with the veterinarians we serve, we transitioned to an all-direct sales strategy in the U.S. on January 1, 2015 and executed similar all-direct strategies and expansions in field sales and marketing presence in international markets over the past few years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that the transformation of our U.S. commercial model, and the investments we have made internationally, have positioned us exceptionally well for sustained growth of our CAG revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After successfully implementing our all-direct domestic strategy in 2014 and 2015, we have continued to invest in the U.S commercial organizationexpanding and increasing our capabilities in serving our U.S. veterinarian customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the last three years, our U.S. CAG field-based professional staffing has grown 75%:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: *Includes all field-based sales and technical services headcount, excluding management, as of December 31.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of this expansion, in 2016 we conducted over 250,000 in person visits with veterinary practices with our field based professionals, or an average of roughly ten visits for every independent veterinary practice in the U.S. market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we continued to augment our commercial efforts in both U.S. and international markets and invested in our global marketing organization  including hiring an experienced Chief Marketing Officer to lead our commercial marketing efforts worldwide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These historical and 2016 investments yielded strong returns for the year:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Organic revenue growth for the company was 11%,1 supported by CAG Diagnostics recurring revenue growth of 12%;  We placed a record number of premium instruments globally:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o More than 5,000 Catalyst chemistry analyzers, resulting in a 23% year-over-year growth in our global Catalyst installed base of 24,500 instruments  the majority of our approximately 43,000 chemistry instruments installed base as of the end of 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o A record number of premium hematology instruments, resulting in a worldwide installed base of approximately 23,500 instruments as of December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o 1,575 SediVue Dx Urine Sediment Analyzers, the first-and-only in-house urine sediment analyzer for the pet healthcar market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We ran approximately 5.2 million IDEXX SDMA kidney screening tests in our reference laboratories worldwide, more than twice the number we ran in 2015, supporting strong growth in our reference laboratory business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We launched a series of other new product innovations, including advanced software capabilities for our diagnostic and software offerings alike.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also continued expanding our market presence globally, capitalizing on the opportunity to enhance pet healthcare worldwide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While a larger number of pets are members of households outside the U.S., international companion animal diagnostic utilization s typically much lower, as the international market is generally much earlier in the pet healthcare adoption cycle than in the U.S., even though pet owners throughout the world love their pets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that supporting the expansion of the international pet healthcare market through our investment in technology and commercial resources represents a unique opportunity for us to create sustainable, long-term value for our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Increasing our Enduring, Profitable Recurring Revenue Streams and Expanding our Profits and Cash Flow, Supporting Disciplined Capital Allocation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because many of the products and services in our CAG business (which represented 86% of our total 2016 revenue)  including reference lab services, instrument consumables and rapid assay test kits - generate revenue for our customers and us each time they are used, they represent recurring revenue streams.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recurring CAG diagnostic revenue (which represented 72% of our tota 2016 revenue) is growing, scalable, and highly profitable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This recurring stream of revenues is the foundation of our economic model and supports our continued strong financial performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given the growth of these revenue streams, supported by an expanding pet healthcare market and broader adoption of our products and services, we have a unique opportunity to continue to deliver strong value for our stockholders as we grow and scale the business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continued expansion of our recurring revenue streams  supported by our continued focus on investing to grow our attractive, core businesses -- has enabled us to consistently drive high growth in earnings per share and strong free cash flow.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We increased diluted earnings per share by approximately 19% in 20162, with an adjusted constant currency EPS growth of 25% year over year.3
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Solid operating margin improvement of 100 basis points (or 170 basis points of improvement on an adjusted constant currency basis),4 strong cash flow generation and optimization of our capital structure supported allocation of capital to share repurchases after providing for the growth needs of the business in R&D and capital investment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This performance is above the high end of our long-term goals for EPS growth, reflected in our long-term financial potential model:5
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revenue Growth 10%+  +  Operating Margin  Expansion 50 - 100 bps  +  Capital Allocation  Leverage 2% - 3% Incremental EPS Growth     Long-Term  EPS Growth Potential 15% - 20%+
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the last three years, we have delivered strong profit results while advancing investment in our high-return core businesses and transforming our commercial model in the U.S. Over this same three-year period, we allocated $1.3 billion to repurchase 18% of our outstanding shares at an average price of $72 per share.6
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our disciplined approach to capital allocation resulted in a 21% after-tax return on invested capital in 2016, reinforcing the attractiveness of our business strategy and focus.7
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A full review of our 2016 financial performance can be found in the financial statements contained in our 2016 Annual Report on Form 10-K, which is accessible on our companys website (www.idexx.com) and was filed with the SEC on February 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strong Governance and Executive Compensation Practices
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are committed to strong governance and executive compensation practices, which we believe support long-term stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some highlights include robust stock ownership guidelines for our Directors and executives, risk oversight by the Board and a commitment to nominating and retaining independent Directors who have the right mix of skills, experience, knowledge and diverse backgrounds that best enables the Board to fulfill its responsibilities to our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This commitment to robust Board composition is demonstrated by the addition of five new independent Directors to our Board over the last five years, each of whom brings new skills and perspectives to our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A more comprehensive discussion of our governance and executive compensation practices can be found beginning on pages 27 and 49, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Looking Ahead
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that the strong foundation and innovative approach to the veterinary diagnostic, software and data market that we have built through 2016 will support sustained revenue growth and continued profitability in 2017 and for years to come.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of us at IDEXX remain committed to our Purpose: to be a great company that creates exceptional long-term value for our customers, employees and stockholders by enhancing the health and well-being of pets, people and livestock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,

sentences.text: Notable Corporate Governance Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that a commitment to high ethical standards and good governance practices contributes to increasing stockholder value by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strengthening Board and management accountability;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Promoting alignment with the long-term interests of our stockholders; and

sentences.text: Helping to maintain our stockholders trust in our company.

sentences.text: Our engaged, diverse and independent Board has implemented and maintained strong corporate governance policies, including prohibitions on pledging, hedging and short sales and a majority-voting standard in uncontested elections.

sentences.text: In addition, the Board actively oversees the development and execution by management of long-term strategies for durable growth and stockholder value creation, as well as playing a key oversight role in risk management.

sentences.text: We believe that the Boards stewardship in these areas have enabled the Company to achieve its strong financial performance relative to its peers and the S&P 500 Index.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These executive compensation highlights should be read in connection with the Executive Compensation section of this Proxy Statement, including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section, for additional information about our executive compensation philosophy and program and the compensation awarded to each of our named executive officers, beginning on page 49.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Executive Compensation Philosophy and Program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation philosophy is simple  we want to attract, motivate and retain talented executives who are aligned with and passionate about our purpose: to be a great company that creates exceptional long-term value for our customers, employees and stockholders by enhancing the health and well-being of pets, people and livestock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that executing this philosophy through our executive compensation program and practices, including a strong focus on pay-for-performance based compensation elements, will support long-term stockholder value creation through driving our strategy of innovation, continued revenue growth, margin improvement and efficient capital allocation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key Elements of Our Executive Compensation Program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program consists of three key elements, which in total are targeted at the median of our competitive market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because it relates most directly to the creation of stockholder value over time, variable compensation is a higher percentage of total compensation for our named executive officers than for our other employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Mix
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The total 2016 direct compensation mix for our Chief Executive Officer and our other named executive officers is:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY SUMMARY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance-Based Cash Bonus
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The target amount of the performance-based cash bonus award for each named executive officer is a percentage of his or her annual base salary, and the award amount is capped at 200% of this target.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance-based cash bonuses are calculated based on the achievement of both financial and non-financial performance goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: constitute 50% of the bonus award factor determination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our non-financial performance goals are designed to support near-term performance of our long-term business objectives, including implementation of commercial strategies, advancement of key talent and engagement initiatives and hiring and development of key leadership talent, including gender and ethnically diverse talent, and collectively constitute 50% of the bonus award factor determination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the overall performance-based award factor was calculated as 154.5% for our Chief Executive Officer and in the range of 144% to 177.8% for our other named executive officers based on achievement of the financial and non- financial performance metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These percentages were then applied to each named executive officers target bonus amounts to calculate the payment of the performance-based cash bonus payment to each such named executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity Based Long-Term Incentives
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our equity-based long-term incentives consist of stock options and restricted stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These equity incentives have a five-year vesting schedule, which is longer than typical market practice, and are more heavily weighted in the form of stock options for our senior executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that these types of equity incentives drive closer alignment with our stockholders long-term interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2016, all restricted stock units granted to our named executive officers as part of our long-term equity incentive program have been performance-based.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These performance-based restricted stock units are intended to be eligible to qualify as performance-based compensation under Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (the Code).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vesting of these restricted stock units is subject to the achievement of a specified financial performance target for the fiscal year in which the restricted stock units were granted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If this target is not met, then these awards will be forfeited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Program at a Glance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We highlight below some of the key objectives, practices and policies of our executive compensation program, as well as some compensation practices that we have not implemented because we believe that they would not serve the long-term interests of our stockholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay-for-Performance Executive  Compensation Program Design Approximately 80% of 2016 target total direct compensation for our Chief Executive Officer and other named executive officers is in the form of annual performance-based cash bonuses and long-term equity incentives, the value of which is variable and directly tied to our performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, performance-based restricted stock units, instead of solely time-based restricted stock units, were granted to each of our named executive officers other than our Chief Executive Officer, who received only stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Capped Incentive Awards Our performance-based cash bonuses are capped at 200% of target.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rigorous, Annual Benchmarking of Executive Compensation We review our designated proxy peer group on an annual basis to ensure that our compensation program is properly benchmarked against our market peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We annually assess our total executive compensation against peer group and other market data to determine whether it is competitive and appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Guidelines We maintain strict stock ownership guidelines that require our named executive officers to own meaningful values of our stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback Policy Our compensation recoupment policy allows us to recover both incentive and equity compensation from our executive officers under certain circumstances if we are required to restate our financial results, other than a restatement due to changes in accounting principles or applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Anti-Hedging and Short Sale Policy Our executives and other employees are prohibited from engaging in any short sale of common stock, any transaction that results in profits from short-term speculative swings in the value of our securities or purchases of financial instruments that are designed to hedge or offset any decrease in the market value of our securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Anti-Pledging Policy We have a policy prohibiting our senior executives from pledging or otherwise encumbering equity securities they own in the Company as collateral for indebtedness, including holding shares in a margin or similar account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Consulting Firm Frederic W. Cook & Co. (FW Cook) provides independent compensation consultation to our Compensation Committee, and does not provide other services to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Compensation Program Risk Assessment FW Cook conducts an annual assessment of our compensation programs to identify risk or potential for unintended consequences in the design of our compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee annually reviews and discusses this risk assessment with FW Cook and, based on that review, has consistently determined that the risks associated with our compensation policies and practices are not reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Modest Perquisites We offer only limited benefits and perquisites to our named executive officers that are not otherwise made available to our other salaried employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Tax Gross Ups We do not administer tax gross ups with respect to perquisites or benefits provided to our named executive officers or with respect to excise taxes related to parachute payments under Section 280G of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Favorable Annual Say-On-Pay Votes Since 2011 We have had favorable say-on-pay votes each year since 2011, and our stockholders voted more than 99% in favor of executive compensation in 2016, which was among the highest favorable approval percentage of our 2016 peer group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our lowest favorable vote was 97% in 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Employment Contracts (Other than CEO) Other than an employment agreement with our Chief Executive Officer and change in control agreements with our executives, we do not have employment contracts with our executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No SERP Consistent with our philosophy of providing only modest perquisites to our executives, we do not have a Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan (SERP) in place for any of our executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Nomination Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee identifies, evaluates, recruits and makes recommendations to the Board regarding candidates to fill vacancies on the Board using the criteria described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The process followed by the Nominating and Governance Committee includes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Receiving recommendations from the Board, management and stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holding meetings to evaluate biographical information and background material relating to potential candidates; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Interviewing selected candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Nominating and Governance Committee, in some instances, will engage an executive search firm to assist in recruiting candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In such cases, the executive search firm assists the Nominating and Governance Committee in:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Identifying a diverse slate of potential candidates that fit the Boards search criteria;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Obtaining candidate resumes and other biographical information;  Conducting initial interviews to assess candidates qualifications, fit
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Conducting initial interviews to assess candidates qualifications, fit and interest in serving on the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performing reference checks; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assisting in finalizing arrangements with candidates who receive an offer to join the Board.

sentences.text: Stockholder Recommendation and Nomination of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who want to recommend a nominee for Director should submit the name of the nominee to our Corporate Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices, together with biographical information and background material sufficient for the Nominating and Governance Committee to evaluate the recommended candidate based on its selection criteria, and a statement as to whether the stockholder or group of stockholders making the recommendation has beneficially owned more than 5% of our common stock for at least a year as of the date the recommendation is made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming that appropriate biographical and background material has been provided on a timely basis, the Nominating and Governance Committee will apply the same criteria, and follow substantially the same process, in considering each qualifying stockholder recommendation as it does in considering other candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders also have the right under our Amended and Restated By-Laws to nominate Director candidates directly, without any action or recommendation on the part of the Nominating and Governance Committee or the Board, by following the procedures described under Requirements for Submission of Proxy Proposals, Nomination of Directors and Other Business of Stockholders beginning on page 79.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Board determines to nominate a stockholder-recommended candidate and recommends his or her election, then his or her name will be included on the proxy card for our next Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates nominated by stockholders in accordance with the procedures set forth in our Amended and Restated By-Laws will not be included on our proxy card for the next Annual Meeting, but may be included on proxies the nominating stockholders seek independently.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority Voting and Director Resignation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Amended and Restated By-Laws provide that, in an election of Directors where the number of nominees does not exceed the number of Directors to be elected, a nominee who does not receive a majority of votes cast with respect to his or her election will not be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to our Director Resignation Policy included in our Corporate Governance Guidelines, a Director who is not re-elected is required to promptly tender his or her resignation, and the Nominating and Governance Committee would make a recommendation to the Board as to whether to accept the resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following the Nominating and Governance Committees recommendation, the Board would determine whether or not to accept that Directors resignation, considering any factors it deems relevant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this policy, the Board is required to act on the recommendation of the Nominating and Governance Committee within 90 days of the certification of the stockholder vote.

sentences.text: The Board is responsible for monitoring the overall performance of IDEXX.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other things, the Board, directly and through its Committees:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversees our long-term strategy for creating enduring growth and stockholder value creation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews and approves our key financial and other objectives, the annual budget and other significant actions and transactions;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversees our processes for maintaining the integrity of our financial statements and other public disclosures and our compliance with law and high ethical standards;  Oversees the prudent management of risk;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: officers; and  Reviews the performance of the Chief Executive Officer and determines the compensation of our executive officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with general corporate legal principles applicable to corporations organized under the laws of Delaware, the Board does not manage the day-to-day operations of IDEXX.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are responsible for attending Board and Committee meetings and for devoting the time needed to discharge their responsibilities properly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board held five meetings in 2016, and the Committees held a total of twenty meetings in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of our Directors attended 100 percent of the meetings of the Board and Committees on which he or she served in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It s our policy to schedule Board and Committee meetings to coincide with the Annual Meeting, and Directors are expected to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting.

sentences.text: Last year, all of the individuals then serving as Directors attended our 2016 Annual Meeting.

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Corporate Governance Guidelines, a majority of our Directors must be independent as defined by the rules of the NASDAQ Stock Market (NASDAQ).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Committees charter requires its members to be independent as defined by NASDAQ rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional independence criteria are also required to be satisfied by Directors serving on the Audit Committee and the Compensation Committee, as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Audit Committee charter, each Audit Committee member is also required to satisfy the independence criteria set forth in Rule 10A-3(b)(1) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Compensation Committee charter, each Compensation Committee member is also required to satisfy the heightened independence standard described in NASDAQ Rule 5605(d)(2)(A).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board, in consultation with the Nominating and Governance Committee, determines the independence of each Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2017, the Board determined that:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Directors other than Mr. Ayers, who is our President and Chief Executive Officer, is independent under NASDAQ rules;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Audit Committee member satisfies the independence criteria of Rule 10A-3(b)(1) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After taking into consideration the applicable factors, each Compensation Committee member satisfies the independence criteria of NASDAQ rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: n determining Dr. Vandebroeks independence, the Nominating and Governance Committee considered two relationships nvolving Dr. Vandebroek.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, the Nominating and Governance Committee considered the fact that Dr. Vandebroek served, until December 2016, as Chief Technology Officer and Corporate Vice President of Xerox Corporation (Xerox), a provider of office technology equipment and other related services for the Company, as well as the fact that Dr. Vandebroek has since January 2017, served as Chief Operating Officer of IBM Research, the corporate research lab of International Business Machines Corporation (IBM), a provider of office technology equipment and other related services for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In reviewing these relationships, the Nominating and Governance Committee considered several factors including, among other hings:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The fact that the Companys relationship with Xerox predated Dr. Vandebroek joining Xerox
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The fact that the Companys relationship with IBM predated Dr. Vandebroek joining IBM;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That Dr. Vandebroek did not participate in the negotiation by the Company of any transactions with Xerox or IBM for their respective services to the Company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That such services were provided on arms length terms and conditions and in the ordinary course of business; and  That the services provided by both Xerox and IBM are routine and limited in scope (the Company paid Xerox (including certain of its subsidiaries) approximately $236,000 in 2014, approximately $124,000 in 2015 and approximately $799,000 in 2016 for office technology equipment and other related services, and the Company paid IBM approximately $247,000 in 2014 for software licenses, software consulting and related services and approximately $4,000 in 2015 and approximately $8,000 in 2016 for software licenses and related services).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the factors considered by the Nominating and Governance Committee, it concluded that these transactions would not affect Dr. Vandebroeks independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Related Person Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted a written Related Person Transaction Policy under which the Audit Committee is required to review and approve any transaction involving more than $120,000 in which the Company is a participant and in which any related person has or will have a direct or indirect material interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee may approve any such transaction only if it determines that, under all of the applicable circumstances, the transaction is not inconsistent with the best interests of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A related person under this policy is:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any executive officer;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Director, or nominee for Director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A holder of 5% or more of our common stock; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An immediate family member of any of those persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy provides that a direct or indirect material interest does not arise solely from the related persons position as an executive officer of another entity involved in a transaction with the Company, where:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The related person owns less than a 10% equity interest in such entity;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The related person and his or her immediate family members are not involved in the negotiation of the terms of the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: transaction and do not receive any special benefits as a result of the transaction;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount involved in the transaction equals less than the greater of $200,000 or 5% of the annual gross revenue of the other entity involved in the transaction; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount involved in the transaction equals less than 2% of the consolidated gross revenues of the Company for its most recent fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since January 1, 2016, there have been no related person transactions requiring review and approval by the Audit Committee under the Related Person Transaction Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ayers has been the Chairman of the Board since joining the Company as Chief Executive Officer in 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Corporate Governance Guidelines, when the Chairman of the Board is not an independent Director, the independent Directors annually elect a Lead Director from among the independent Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board has no greater nor lesser vote on matters considered by the Board than any other Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Directors, including the Chairman, are bound by fiduciary obligations imposed by law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed above under Director Independence, each Director other than Mr. Ayers is an independent director under NASDAQ rules, and every member of each standing Committee is also independent under those rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is free to select the Chairman of the Board and the Chief Executive Officer in any way it deems best for our stockholders at any point in time, and the Board does not have a predetermined policy as to whether or not the roles of Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer should be combined or separate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to our Corporate Governance Guidelines, he Nominating and Governance Committee annually assesses the Boards leadership structure, including whether the roles of Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer should be combined or separate and why the Boards leadership structure is appropriate given the specific characteristics or circumstances of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2017, the Nominating and Governance Committee conducted that annual assessment and determined that a combined full-time Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer, subject to oversight by the Companys independent Directors, including an independent Lead Director, is appropriate for the following reasons:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: First, the Chief Executive Officer is responsible for the day-to-day management of the Company and the development and implementation of the Companys strategy, and has access to the people, information and resources necessary to facilitate Board functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As such, the Board believes that the Chief Executive Officer is best positioned to develop the agenda for the Board supported by regular consultation and input from the Lead Director, and to lead discussions at Board meetings regarding the Companys strategy, operations and results;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Third, during Mr. Ayerss 15-year tenure as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, the Company has generated a compound average annual return to stockholders of 22%; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fourth, as described above, oversight of the Company is the responsibility of the Board as a whole, which is composed entirely of independent Directors, other than Mr. Ayers, including an independent Lead Director, whose responsibilities include those described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The position of Lead Director has significant authority and responsibilities under the Corporate Governance Guidelines, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oard Meetings and Executive Sessions Chairing the executive sessions of the independent Directors, which occur at each regularly scheduled Board meeting to discuss, among other things, the performance of the Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Scheduling, as and when needed, executive sessions of the independent Directors in addition to those occurring at each regularly scheduled Board meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communications with Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Facilitating communications between Board members and the Chairman of the Board and/or Chief Executive Officer (although any Director is free to communicate directly with the Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: gendas Working with the Chairman of the Board and the Chief Executive Officer in preparing the agenda for each Board meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Consulting with and advising the Chairman of the Board and/or the Chief Executive Officer on matters relating to corporate governance and Board functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Board Self-Assessment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee is responsible for evaluating the performance of the Board, its Committees and each of the Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of this evaluation is to identify ways to enhance the effectiveness of the Board, its Committees and the Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The evaluation process includes completion of questionnaires and interviews with each Director to solicit candid feedback and gather additional suggestions for improvement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The responses and comments of the Directors are then compiled and presented by the Lead Director to the Nominating and Governance Committee and the Board for discussion and action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Talent Management and Succession Planning
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Succession planning and talent development are an integral part of our long-term strategy for sustained stockholder value creation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee is responsible for annually reviewing succession plans for the Chief Executive Officer and our other executive officers, and the Board is responsible for ensuring the existence of appropriate succession plans for these executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chief Executive Officer is responsible for preparing an annual report to the Board regarding succession planning for himself, and as part of this annual report, our Chief Executive Officer provides his evaluations and recommendation of potential future candidates for the position of Chief Executive Officer, including possible timing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board, both directly and through the Compensation Committee, also reviews plans for identifying and developing potential future candidates for other senior leadership roles, and the Board members interact with many of these candidates in formal and informal settings during the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that diversity among our employees and senior management including, but not limited to, gender and ethnic diversity, helps drive both innovation and a better understanding of our increasingly global customer base.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Throughout our Company, we seek to employ a broad representation of gender, ethnic, and racial backgrounds in all levels of management and on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that senior management and Directors with a variety of backgrounds, experiences, education, skills and business knowledge will contribute to the Companys effectiveness and, thus, we are focused on ensuring that a wide range of backgrounds and experiences are represented in the Company and on our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We actively seek out highly qualified diverse candidates (including gender and ethnically diverse candidates) to include in each pool of potential senior management and Board nominees, and we consider the value of diversity of all types when evaluating nominees and assessing our Board members and senior-level management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Boards Role in Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for risk management on a day-today basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board oversees the risk management activities of management directly and through its Committees by discussing with management the policies and practices they utilize in assessing and managing risks and providing input on those policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, the Board oversees risk management activities relating to business strategy, acquisitions, capital allocation and structure, legal, compliance and regulatory risk, and operational risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees oversee certain areas of risk management too, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: activities and financial instruments;  the Compensation Committee oversees risk management activities relating to the Companys compensation policies practices and organizational risk; and  the Nominating and Governance Committee oversees risk management activities relating to Board composition and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Committee reports to the full Board on a regular basis, including with respect to its risk oversight activities as appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We conduct an annual enterprise risk assessment as part of our annual strategic planning process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The risk assessment process involves an identification and assessment by senior line of business and functional leaders of the particular risks relevant to their lines of business and functional areas, the materiality of those risks and plans to mitigate them to the extent prudent and feasible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The identified risks are ranked based on probability of occurrence and severity of impact.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management shares the result of this annual risk assessment with the full Board in conjunction with the Boards discussion of the Companys annual strategic plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain risks and related mitigation plans are also reviewed throughout the year either by the Board or its Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also conduct a compliance risk assessment, the results of which are shared by management with the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: risk assessment involves an identification and assessment by functional leaders of the particular legal and regulatory compliance risks relevant to their areas of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The risks are ranked based on materiality and maturity of controls by functional leaders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plans to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: mitigate the top risks are also shared and discussed with the full Board at various times of the year as part of normal business discussions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviews linkages between the critical risk findings, management preparedness or plans to address those risks, and internal audits tests of those plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee seeks to ensure that the internal audit department can perform its function by reviewing the charter, plans, activities, staffing and organizational structure of the internal audit department, and approving the appointment, replacement, reassignment or dismissal of the Director of Internal Audit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also provides an open channel of communication between internal audit and the Board; meets independently with the Companys internal auditors, independent auditors and management; and discusses with management the Companys major policies with respect to risk assessment and risk management, including an annual review of the Companys insurance coverage.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has established four standing committees  an Audit Committee, a Compensation Committee, a Nominating and Governance Committee and a Finance Committee, each of which is described briefly below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Committee acts pursuant to a written charter that is approved by the Board and reviewed annually by the applicable Committee, the Nominating and Governance Committee and the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Current copies of each Committees charter can be accessed on the Corporate Governance section of our website www.idexx.com or by contacting our Corporate Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary at the Companys principal executive offices.

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members   Mr. Junius (chair) Mr. Claflin Mr. Craig Ms. Szostak Meetings held in 2016  9 Committee Responsibilities The Audit Committee is responsible for overseeing the accounting, internal control, financial reporting, information system controls and security, compliance and audit processes of the Company, including the selection, retention and oversight of the Companys independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also oversees elements of the Companys risk management activities and reviews and approves all related person transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee meets from time to time with the Companys financial personnel, other members of management, internal audit staff and independent auditors regarding these matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee has determined that each Audit Committee member is financially literate and that Mr. Junius, Mr. Claflin and Ms. Szostak are each an Audit Committee Financial Expert as defined under the SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Audit Committee members is independent as defined by NASDAQ rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has established policies and procedures for the pre-approval of all services provided by the independent auditors, which are described on page 45.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has also adopted procedures for the receipt, retention and treatment of complaints received by the Company regarding accounting, internal accounting controls, or auditing matters, and the confidential, anonymous submission of any concerns regarding questionable accounting or auditing matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee may retain independent counsel, accountants, or others to assist it in the conduct of any investigation, and the Company will provide appropriate funding for payment of such services, as determined by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee Report is included on page 44.

sentences.text: Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members   Ms. Szostak (chair)  Mr. Craig  Mr. End  Mr. Kingsley Meetings held in 2016  4 Committee Responsibilities The Compensation Committee oversees the management compensation philosophy and practices of IDEXX, evaluates the performance of the Chief Executive Officer, determines the compensation of the Chief Executive Officer and approves the compensation of other senior executives, reviews managements overall leadership development plan and annually reviews succession plans for the Chief Executive Officer and other executive officers of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee also has primary responsibility to oversee the Companys equity compensation and benefit plans, determines any stock ownership and retention guidelines applicable to the Companys executives and Directors and reviews compliance with those guidelines, and reviews the compensation of non-employee Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Compensation Committee oversees the Companys policies on structuring compensation programs to preserve tax deductibility, analyzes the risks associated with the Companys compensation practices, reviews the Compensation Discussion and Analysis and prepares the Compensation Committee Report required to be included in the Companys annual proxy statement, and reviews the results of the stockholder votes on the say-on-pay and say-on- frequency proposals set forth in the Companys annual proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee charter does not provide for any delegation of these duties except to a sub-committee or individual members of the Committee as the Compensation Committee may determine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Compensation Committee members is independent as defined by NASDAQ rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee reviews Director compensation periodically and makes a recommendation to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more information on the responsibilities and activities of the Compensation Committee, including the Compensation Committees process for determining executive compensation and the role of the independent compensation consultant to the Compensation Committee, see the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section of this Proxy Statement beginning on page 49.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee Report is included on page 62.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members   Mr. Claflin (chair) Mr. End Dr. Henderson  Dr. Vandebroek Meetings held in 2016  5 Committee Responsibilities The Nominating and Governance Committee advises and makes recommendations to the Board with respect to corporate governance practices, including Board composition, organization, function, membership and performance, and succession planning for the Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee may retain, at the Companys expense, independent counsel or other advisors as it deems necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Nominating and Governance Committee members is independent as defined by NASDAQ rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee identifies, evaluates, recruits and makes recommendations to the Board regarding candidates to fill vacancies on the Board as described on pages 19 and 20.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee annually reviews the performance of the Board, its Committees and each of the Directors, as described under Annual Board Self-Assessment on page 30.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee is also responsible for annually reviewing with the Board the requisite skills and criteria for all Board members, as well as the composition of the Board as a whole, and annually assessing, for each Director or person nominated to become a Director, the specific experience, qualifications, attributes and skills, including those described on pages 11 and 19, that lead the Nominating and Governance Committee to conclude that such Director or nominee should serve as a Director in light of our business and structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finance Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members   Dr. Henderson (chair)  Dr. Johnson  Mr. Junius  Mr. Kingsley  Dr. Vandebroek Meetings held in 2016  2 Committee Responsibilities The Finance Committee advises the Board with respect to financial matters and capital allocation, including capital structure, debt financing strategies, investment practices, major financial commitments, financial risk management, acquisitions and divestitures, stock repurchase strategy and dividend policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Finance Committee members is independent as defined by NASDAQ rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Finance Committee monitors our liquidity and financial condition, oversees our financial risk management activities (including foreign currency hedging and transactions involving derivatives), reviews and approves proposed acquisitions and divestitures requiring Board approval and having values up to $40 million and reviews and approves non-budgeted capital expenditures in excess of $5 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted Corporate Governance Guidelines and a Code of Ethics, both which can be accessed on the Corporate Governance section of our website www.idexx.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Hard copies may be obtained by contacting our Corporate Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary at the Companys principal executive offices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Code of Ethics applies to all of our employees, officers and Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we intend to post on our website all disclosures that are required by law or NASDAQ listing standards concerning any amendments to, or waivers from, any provision of the Code of Ethics.

sentences.text: Anti-Hedging and Short Sale and Anti-Pledging Policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted a Policy on Short Sales, Derivative Transactions and Hedging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This anti-hedging and short sale policy generally prohibits any Director, officer or employee, or any family member or affiliate of any of the foregoing, from engaging in
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) any short sales of the Companys securities,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) purchases or sales of puts, calls or other derivative securities based upon the Companys securities, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) purchases of financial instruments that are designed to hedge or offset any decrease in the market value of the Companys securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has also adopted a Policy on Pledging of Company Stock that prohibits our Directors and executive officers from pledging or otherwise encumbering the equity securities they own in the Company as collateral for indebtedness, including holding shares in a margin or similar account that would subject our equity securities to margin calls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-qualified stock options are granted under our 2009 Stock Incentive Plan (the 2009 Plan) and have the following terms:

sentences.text: Exercise price equal to the last reported sales price for a share of our common stock on the grant date;

sentences.text: Each non-employee Director may defer all or any portion of any cash compensation in the form of fully vested deferred stock units, which are issued under the Director Plan and are subject to the terms of the 2009 Plan.

sentences.text: The payment of cash compensation in the form of deferred stock units is considered deferred compensation for federal income tax purposes.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the grant of deferred stock units made on the date of an Annual Meeting (or any prorated grant of deferred stock units made when he or she joins the Board) vests, those vested deferred stock units also are credited to this account.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A change in control under the Director Plan occurs when:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any person or group acquires direct or indirect beneficial ownership of stock possessing 35% or more of the total voting power of the Companys stock; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the Board members is replaced during any 12-month period by new Directors whose appointment or election is not approved by a majority of the Board members serving immediately before the appointment or election o any of these new directors; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A change in the ownership of a substantial portion of our assets occurs on the date that any person or group acquires assets from the Company that have a total gross fair market value equal to or more than 40% of the total gross fair market value of all of our assets immediately prior to such acquisition.

sentences.text: Audit Committee Matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal Two - Ratification of Appointment of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of the Companys independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has appointed PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC) to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017, subject to ratification by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In taking this action, the Audit Committee considered carefully PwCs performance as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm, its independence with respect to the services to be performed and its general reputation for adherence to professional auditing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board believe that the continued retention of PwC as our independent registered public accounting firm is in the best interests of the Company and our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because the members of the Audit Committee value the views of our stockholders on our independent auditors, even though ratification is not required by law, stockholders will have an opportunity to ratify this selection at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of PwC will be present at the 2017 Annual Meeting, will have the opportunity to make a statement if they desire to do so and will be available to respond to appropriate questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If this proposal is not approved at the 2017 Annual Meeting, the Audit Committee may reconsider its selection of PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if the appointment is ratified, the Audit Committee, in its discretion, can direct the appointment of a different firm at any time during the year if the Audit Committee determines that such a change would be in the Companys and our stockholders best interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recommendation of the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends that you vote FOR the ratification of PwC as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for overseeing the accounting, internal control and financial reporting processes and the audit processes of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in the Audit Committees charter, which is available at the Companys website at https://www.idexx.com/corporate/corporate-governance.html, the Companys management is responsible for the preparation, presentation and integrity of the Companys financial statements, the Companys accounting and financial reporting principles, and internal controls and procedures designed to assure compliance with accounting standards and applicable laws and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has a full-time internal audit department that reports to the Audit Committee and management and is responsible for, among other things, objectively reviewing and assessing the adequacy and effectiveness of the Companys internal controls and procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of the Audit Committee is an independent Director as determined by the Board of Directors, based on NASDAQ listing standards and the Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of the Audit Committee also satisfies the SECs additional independence requirement for members of audit committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has determined that Mr. Junius, Mr. Claflin and Ms. Szostak each meet the criteria for Audit Committee Financial Expert as defined by SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At each of its nine regularly scheduled meetings in 2016, the Audit Committee met as a group with the Companys management, the Companys independent registered public accounting firm PwC and internal audit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in performing its oversight function, the Audit Committee held separate private sessions with senior management, the independent auditors and internal audit to assure that all were carrying out their respective responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both PwC and the Director of Internal Audit had full access to the Audit Committee, including regular meetings during which members of management were not present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviewed the Companys audited financial statements for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016 and discussed them with management and PwC;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: required to be discussed by Auditing Standard No. 16, Communications with Audit Committees; and  Received the written disclosures and the letter from PwC required by applicable requirements of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board regarding the registered public accounting firms communications with the Audit Committee concerning independence and discussed with PwC their independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the review and discussion referred to above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board of Directors that the audited financial statements referred to above be included in the Companys Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016 for filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consists of fees billed for professional services rendered for the audit of our annual financial statements and review of the interim financial statements included in quarterly reports; the audit of the effectiveness of our internal controls over financial reporting; statutory audits or financial audits for our subsidiaries or affiliates; services associated with periodic reports and other documents filed with the SEC; consultation concerning accounting or disclosure treatment of transactions or events and actual or potential impact of final or proposed rules, standards or interpretations by the SEC, the Financial Accounting Standards Board or other regulatory or standard setting bodies; and assistance with and review of documents provided to the SEC in responding to SEC comments.
