sentences.text: The Proxy Statement and How Proxies Work
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is asking for your proxy to vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting because you were a stockholder as of the close of business on March 10, 2017 (Record Date) and are entitled to vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement and the accompanying materials are being provided to you in connection with the solicitation by the Board of proxies to be voted at our 2017 Annual Meeting and at any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Giving us your proxy means that you authorize us to vote your shares at the 2017 Annual Meeting in the manner that you direct, or if you do not direct us, in the manner as recommended by the Board in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote for or against one or all of the Director nominees or abstain from voting for one or all nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You also can vote for or against the other proposals or abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you request a proxy card, and return your signed proxy card, but do not give voting instructions, the shares represented by that proxy will be voted FOR each proposal as recommended by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who Can Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the Record Date, there were 87,922,781 shares of common stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of common stock is entitled to one vote on each matter properly brought before the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Most of our stockholders hold their shares through a stockbroker, bank, trustee or other nominee rather than directly in their own name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As summarized below, there are some distinctions between shares held of record and those beneficially owned in street name:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: directly to us or to vote in person at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owner of Shares Held in Street Name: If your shares are held in a brokerage account through a bank, broker, trustee or other nominee, you are considered the beneficial owner of shares held in street name and these proxy materials are being made available to you through your bank, broker, trustee or nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the beneficial owner of shares held in street name, you have the right to direct your bank, broker, trustee, or nominee on how to vote and are also invited to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your bank, broker, trustee or nominee is obligated to provide you with voting instructions for use in instructing the bank, broker, trustee or nominee how to vote these shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, since you are not the stockholder of record, you may not vote these shares in person at the meeting unless you have obtained a legal proxy from your bank, broker, trustee or nominee entitling you to vote your shares at the 2017 Annual Meeting.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead of mailing a printed copy of our proxy materials to each stockholder, we are furnishing proxy materials via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice of Internet Availability, you will not receive a printed copy of the proxy materials unless you specifically request a printed copy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability will instruct you how to access and review all of the important information contained in the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability also instructs you how to submit your proxy on the Internet and how to vote by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to receive a printed or emailed copy of our proxy materials, you should follow the instructions for requesting such materials included in the Notice of Internet Availability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability is first being sent to stockholders on or about March 23, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also on or about March 23, 2017, we will first make available to our stockholders this Proxy Statement and the form of proxy relating to the 2017 Annual Meeting, as well as our 2016 Annual Report on Form 10-K filed with the SEC on February 17, 2017.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How to Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote online at the virtual 2017 Annual Meeting or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recommend that you submit a proxy even if you plan to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This will ensure that your vote will be counted if you are unable to, or later decide not to, participate in the virtual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can revoke your proxy and change your vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting in one of the ways described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares represented by proxies that have been properly voted and not revoked will be voted at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are offering stockholders four methods of voting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered holder of our shares, you may request a paper proxy card from us, and indicate your vote by completing, signing and dating the card where indicated and by mailing or otherwise returning the card in the prepaid envelope accompanying the paper proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote online at the virtual 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you attend the 2017 Annual Meeting over the Internet, you will be able to vote your shares online, even if you already voted by Internet, telephone or mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need to enter your control number (included in your Notice of Internet Availability, your proxy card or the voting instructions that accompanied your proxy materials) to vote your shares at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see How to Vote on page 9 to determine how to vote your shares by mail, telephone or Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revoking a Proxy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can revoke your proxy, whether it was given by Internet, telephone or mail, before it is voted by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting a new proxy with a later date, including a proxy given via the Internet or by telephone;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The last vote you submit chronologically (by any means) will supersede your prior vote(s).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your attendance at the virtual 2017 Annual Meeting over the Internet will not, by itself, revoke your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to transact business at the 2017 Annual Meeting, we must have a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that at least a majority of the issued and outstanding shares entitled to vote as of the Record Date must be represented at the 2017 Annual Meeting, either by proxy or in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes (which are described below) are counted as present and entitled to vote for purposes of determining a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Treasury shares, which are shares owned by us, are not voted and do not count towards establishing a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a quorum is not present, the meeting will be adjourned until a quorum is obtained.

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares held in street name and do not give voting instructions to your bank or brokerage firm, your bank or brokerage firm will be able to vote your shares with respect to certain discretionary items, but will not be allowed to vote your shares with respect to certain non-discretionary items.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Annual Meeting will be a completely virtual meeting of stockholders, which will be conducted over the Internet via live webcast at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Time, on Wednesday, May 3, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The webcast will begin promptly at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Online check-in will begin at 12:45 p.m., Eastern Time, and you should allow ample time for the online check-in procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appendix A  Reconciliation of Non-GAAP Financial Measures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We report our results in conformity with U.S. generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We use certain non-GAAP financial measures in this Proxy Statement to supplement our consolidated results presented in accordance with GAAP or as part of our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our reconciliation of these non-GAAP financial measures is included in this Appendix.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While we believe that these non-GAAP financial measures are useful, this information should be considered as supplemental in nature and should not be considered in isolation or as a substitute for the related financial information prepared in accordance with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, these non-GAAP financial measures may not be the same as similarly titled measures reported by other companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Organic Revenue Growth
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Organic revenue growth represents the percentage change in revenue, as compared to the same period for the prior year, net of the impact of changes in foreign currency exchange rates, acquisitions and divestitures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Organic revenue growth should be considered in addition to, and not as a replacement for or as a superior measure to, revenue growth reported in accordance with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that reporting organic revenue growth provides useful information to investors by facilitating easier comparisons of our revenue performance with prior and future periods and to the performance of our peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this Proxy Statement, we report the Companys organic revenue growth in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The reconciliation of this non-GAAP financial measure is as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Net Revenue (dollars in thousands) For the Year Ended December 31, 2016 For the Year Ended December 31, 2015 Dollar Change Percentage Change Change from Currency Change from Acquisitions Organic Revenue Growth Total Company     $1,775,423     $1,601,892    $173,531    10.8%    (0.8%)     0.2%    11.4%
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted Constant Currency EPS Growth
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted constant currency EPS growth represents the percentage change in earnings per share (diluted), as compared to the same period for the prior year, net of the impact of changes in foreign currency exchange rates and excluding non-recurring items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted constant currency EPS growth should be considered in addition to, and not as a replacement of or a superior measure to, earnings per share (diluted) growth reported in accordance with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that reporting adjusted constant currency EPS growth provides useful information to investors by facilitating easier comparisons of our earnings per share performance with prior and future periods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this Proxy Statement, we report the adjusted constant currency EPS growth for 2016, which excludes the effect of an $8.2 million non-cash software impairment charge in the third quarter of 2015, which represents approximately $0.06 per share in earnings per share (diluted) for 2015, and the impact of changes in foreign currency exchange rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We estimate the net impact of changes in foreign currency exchange rates on adjusted EPS results by restating results to the average exchange rates or exchange rate assumptions for the comparative period, which includes adjusting for the estimated impacts of foreign currency hedging transactions and certain impacts on our effective tax rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted Constant Currency Operating Margin Improvement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted constant currency operating margin improvement represents the percentage change in operating margin, as compared to the same period for the prior year, net of the impact of changes in foreign currency exchange rates and excluding non- recurring items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted constant currency operating margin improvement should be considered in addition to, and not as a replacement of or a superior measure to, operating margin improvement reported in accordance with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that reporting adjusted constant currency operating margin improvement provides useful information to investors by facilitating easier comparisons of our operating margin performance with prior and future periods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this Proxy Statement, we report the adjusted constant currency operating margin improvement for 2016, which excludes the effect of an $8.2 million non-cash software impairment charge in the third quarter of 2015, which represents approximately 50 basis points for operating margin for 2015, and the impact of changes in foreign currency exchange rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We estimate the net impact of changes in foreign currency exchange rates on adjusted operating margin results by restating results to the average exchange rates or exchange rate assumptions for the comparative period, which includes adjusting for the estimated impacts of foreign currency hedging transactions and certain impacts on our effective tax rates.

sentences.text: After-Tax Return on Invested Capital
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After-tax return on invested capital represents our after-tax income from operations for the year ended December 31, 2016, divided by our average invested capital using the beginning and ending balance sheet values.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After-tax return on invested capital, after-tax income from operations and average invested capital are not measures of financial performance under GAAP and should be considered in addition to, and not as a replacement of or a superior measure to, return on assets, net income, total assets or other financial measures reported in accordance with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that reporting after-tax return on invested capital provides useful information to investors for evaluating the efficiency and effectiveness of our use of capital.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this Proxy Statement, we report our after-tax return on invested capital for 2016.
